title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 227.2 - Selection of devices for approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 227.2 - Selection of devices for approval

State Regulations

One or more units of equipment covered by the application, as determined by staff, shall be made available for testing and may be retained
for such purpose by the commission. Such units shall be intended for actual use
and not include experimental models. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
227.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
